title: Hana\*Pare!: Hanasaku Shoutengai On Parade
original_name: はな＊ぱれっ! 花咲商店街オンパレード
sinopse: Takato, who is this story's protagonist, became a president of Hanasaki shopping district that became deserted, but Takato though up a plan to revive the place. That is, he starts to lend the vacant stores to young people for free.
